p: Recombination analyses for pol and env was undertaken using RDP4 software ( Martin et al. 2015). Aligned datasets were uploaded and auto mask for optimal recombination detection applied. Events with three or more methods showing associated P-values <10 − 3 combined with strong phylogenetic support were considered as genuine events. Recombination-free datasets with recombination regions removed from all sequences were generated for downstream Bayesian evolutionary analysis by sampling trees (BEAST) analyses.
